content: Xiaolong Ma – The University of Arizona Skip to content Xiaolong Ma – The University of Arizona Contact information:ECE building, room 456F.Phone: (520) 621-2412Email: xiaolongma@arizona.eduFaculty website Xiaolong Ma is an assistant professor in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering @ The University of Arizona. He received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Engineering from Northeastern University (NEU), Boston in 2022, supervised by Professor Yanzhi Wang. His research interests include: Scalable and efficient AI systemTrustworthy and privacy-preserving machine learning Computer Vision (CV) and Large Language Models (LLMs) Algorithm, optimization Useful links: Google Scholar, DBLP I am always looking for highly-motivated PhDs / masters / interns to work in the area of Efficient AI. If you are interested in joining my group, please send me your CV and transcripts.
